title: online-mode自动打开
author: TSYmiao
txt_content:
本帖最后由 TSYmiao 于 2013-4-17 08:08 编辑 

RT~
server.properties打开前改好，保存几次，留着不关
bat跑完后再打开一个server.properties，online-mode就变成true了
求解求详细

08:01:22 [WARNING] **** SERVER IS RUNNING IN OFFLINE/INSECURE MODE!
08:01:22 [WARNING] The server will make no attempt to authenticate usernames. Beware.
08:01:22 [WARNING] While this makes the game possible to play without internet access, it also opens up the ability for hackers to connect with any username they choose.
08:01:22 [WARNING] To change this, set "online-mode" to "true" in the server.properties file.
